text: We Were Strangers is a 1949 American adventure drama movie directed by John Huston and was based on the 1948 novel Rough Sketch by Robert Sylvester. It stars Jennifer Jones, John Garfield, Pedro Armend√°riz, Gilbert Roland, Ramon Novarro, Wally Cassell and was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1949 drama movies Category:1949 adventure movies Category:American adventure movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by John Huston Category:Columbia Pictures movies
title: We Were Strangers
